summary: FVS Media Integration testing complete. Real thumbnail generation via OpenAI GPT-Image-1 is working. Audio generation gracefully falls back to mock when ELEVENLABS_API_KEY is not configured. All 7 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend FVS System page and Assets page working correctly.
passed_tests: POST /api/fvs/produce-episode creates REAL thumbnail via OpenAI GPT-Image-1 (isMocked: false, provider: openai_gpt_image_1)
POST /api/fvs/produce-episode gracefully falls back to mocked audio when ELEVENLABS_API_KEY missing
Response includes warnings array when audio falls back to mock
Thumbnail asset has provider: openai_gpt_image_1 and isMocked: false
Audio asset has provider: mock_elevenlabs and isMocked: true
Video asset and videoTask remain mocked (P2 feature)
Submission and all assets are created successfully
Assets appear correctly on /api/assets endpoint with correct metadata
Frontend: FVS System page loads with Episode Ideas, Produce buttons, Recent Activity
Frontend: Assets page shows FVS-generated assets with correct types
critical_code_review_comments: media_service.py properly abstracts provider interfaces for future Stability AI swap
Graceful fallback pattern implemented correctly - returns mock URL + warning when API key missing
Thumbnails are ~2.4MB base64 data URLs - P2 should upload to first-party storage (S3/Google Drive)
Audio also uses base64 data URL when real - same P2 storage consideration applies
seed_data_creation: None - used existing seed data and FVS-generated content
context_for_next_testing_agent: FVS media integration is complete. Thumbnail generation uses OpenAI GPT-Image-1 via EMERGENT_LLM_KEY (real). Audio generation uses ElevenLabs but falls back to mock since ELEVENLABS_API_KEY is not configured. Video generation remains mocked (P2). Response includes warnings array when fallbacks occur. Assets have provider and isMocked fields for tracking.

mocked_integrations.audio_generation: MOCKED - ElevenLabs API key not configured, falls back to placeholder URL
mocked_integrations.video_generation: MOCKED - P2 feature, uses sample video URL
